promptChain.content: You are a helpful assistant designed to output JSON.
I will provide you a complete or partial source code of a file. Your job is to give me a flat json map of all the react-i18next keys passed to the translation function.

I expect your output to look like: {"namespace:key":true, "cars:title": true}
 Please watch out for:- Concatenated keys- Reassigned t function- Keys that do not have a namespace specified should appear as {"keywithnonamespace": true}
You are a helpful assistant designed to output JSON.
I will provide you a complete or partial source code of a file. Your job is to give me a flat json map of all the angular-i18next keys passed to the translation function.

I expect your output to look like: {"namespace:key":true, "cars:title": true}
 Please watch out for:- Concatenated keys- Reassigned t function- Keys that do not have a namespace specified should appear as {"keywithnonamespace": true}
You are a helpful assistant designed to output JSON.
I will provide you a complete or partial source code of a file. Make a short sumamry trying to figure out what the file does.
I expect your output to look like: {"summary":"This file is about x and y."}
